tool_description: Gracefully ends chat sessions, collecting feedback and generating session summaries for record keeping.

termination_reason.description: Reason for ending: resolved, customer_left, timeout, escalated

resolution_status.description: Issue resolution status: resolved, unresolved, partially_resolved

error_messages: Invalid session_id: Session not found or already terminated
Invalid termination_reason: Use one of [resolved, customer_left, timeout, escalated]
Invalid resolution_status: Use one of [resolved, unresolved, partially_resolved]
Invalid satisfaction rating: Must be integer between 1 and 5
Termination failed: Unable to close chat session
usage: Provide session_id and termination_reason as required parameters. Include resolution_status, customer_satisfaction, and agent_notes when available for complete closure.
